description: A shield is an item that protects ships from losing health when attacked.

maxLife.description: The maximum life that this shield can possess.

idleTime.description: The amount of idle time needed before shield health regenerates.

regenSpd.description: The speed of health regeneration, in health points per second.

bulletDmgFactor.description: The damage multiplier when the damage is bullet typed.

energyDmgFactor.description: The damage multiplier when the damage is energy typed.

explosionDmgFactor.description: The damage multiplier when the damage is explosion typed.

displayName.description: The display name of this shield. Must be any non-blank string of printable ascii characters.

price.description: The cost to buy/sell this shield.

absorbSound.description: The gestalt ID of the sound effect played upon damage absorption

absorbSoundPitch.description: The multiplier to raise/lower the pitch of absorbSound by.

regenSound.description: The gestalt ID of the sound effect played upon shield regen
